text.text_translated: An asteroid is a large rock that travels through space. An asteroid might be on a course to hit Earth. In that case, one suggested defence is to blow it up with a nuclear weapon. This idea may sound like the plot from a film. It was the subject of the 1998 movie *Armageddon*. However, NASA has a real plan for this called HAMMER. The plan is to fire eight-ton rockets at an approaching asteroid. The hope is that this will push it off course. However, this plan might not work if the asteroid was too close to Earth. In that case, the rockets would carry nuclear bombs to blow it up instead.
